summary.title: Preview release of License Manager integration
summary.summary: License Manager support is now in Preview.

2025-07-14.content:
[Preview stage](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages) support for the following integration:

* [Address Validation API](https://cloud.google.com/vpc-service-controls/docs/supported-products#table_address_validation)
* [Places (New) API](https://cloud.google.com/vpc-service-controls/docs/supported-products#table_places_new)

summary.title: Preview Support for Address Validation and Places APIs
summary.summary: We are introducing preview support for Address Validation API and Places (New) API, enhancing your ability to manage security policies for these services.

2025-07-07.content:
[General availability](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages) support for the following integration:

* [Apigee API hub](https://cloud.google.com/vpc-service-controls/docs/supported-products#table_api_hub)

summary.title: New Feature: Apigee API hub GA
summary.summary: Apigee API hub is now generally available.

summary.title: Preview: FleetPackage API Support
summary.summary: The FleetPackage API is now available in preview, enhancing integration capabilities within VPC Service Controls.

summary.title: Parameter Manager Now Generally Available
summary.summary: Parameter Manager is now generally available for integration, enhancing your ability to manage parameters within your systems.
